launch_terminal.description: List input and output information per process

terminal_command.default: watch -n 1 \" find /proc/ -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 2 -type f -name stat -exec cut -d' ' -f 1,2,42 {} \+ | sort -r -n -k 3,3 | head -n 40 | sed '1 i pid executable iodelay' | column -t \"
